numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The Women's basketball league data is from 2019.
2. I wonder why the chart shows managers in baseball.
3. I wonder why the chart does not show head coaches of color in baseball.
4. The percentage of head coaches of color is highest in soccer.
5. I wonder what the numbers would be in this year because of Covid.
6. The percentage of coaches of color is lowest in football.
7. I wonder why there is no bar graph for the Women's basketball league for 2020.
8. In all categories, the number of players of color is higher than the number of coaches of color.
9. I wonder why there are more players of color than coaches of color.
